points.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

case.title: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
case.localized_title: Un mécanisme de réclamation est prévu pour le traitement des données à caractère personnel.
case.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.

points.title: This service is only available to users over 18 years of age

case.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
case.localized_title: Ce service est réservé aux utilisateurs âgés de plus de 18 ans.
case.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

points.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

case.title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
case.localized_title: Les pixels de suivi sont utilisés dans la communication entre les services et les utilisateurs.
case.description: The service tracks the user count or some actions of the user; this is usually used for statistics. For example, emails sent by a service can contain a pixel tag, which is a small, clear image that can tell them whether or not you have opened an email and what your IP address is.

points.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements

case.title: There is a date of the last update of the agreements
case.localized_title: Il y a une date de la dernière mise à jour des accords.
case.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

points.title: This service assumes no liability for unauthorized access to your personal information

case.title: This service assumes no liability for unauthorized access to your personal information
case.localized_title: Ce service n'assume aucune responsabilité en cas d'accès non autorisé à vos informations personnelles

points.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

case.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
case.localized_title: Ce service est uniquement disponible pour une utilisation individuelle et non commerciale.
case.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.

points.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties

case.title: Information is gathered about you through third parties
case.localized_title: Ce service recueille des informations sur vous par l'intermédiaire de tiers
case.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.

points.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

case.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
case.localized_title: Vous autorisez le service à débiter une carte de crédit fournie sur une base récurrente.
case.description: You card will be billed on recurring basis unless cancelled. For instance, monthly or annual subscriptions.

points.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account

case.title: You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account and for the activities on your account
case.localized_title: Vous êtes responsable du maintien de la sécurité de votre compte et des activités qui s'y déroulent
case.description: You are responsible for protecting the confidentiality of your password and for maintaining the security of your account. Any activity occurring under your account is your responsibility, whether authorized by you or not.

points.title: The service can delete your account without a reason, but upon prior notice

case.title: Your account can be deleted or permanently suspended without prior notice and without a reason
case.localized_title: Le service peut supprimer votre compte sans raison, mais avec un préavis.
case.description: At any time, your account can be terminated without explanation and without warning by the service.

points.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes

case.title: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes
case.localized_title: Ce service peut utiliser vos informations personnelles à des fins de marketing
case.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.

points.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time

case.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
case.localized_title: Vous avez le droit de quitter ce service à tout moment
case.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.

points.title: Private messages can be read
points.analysis: "In particular, we collect: [...] - Information sent either one-to-one or within a limited group using our message, chat, post, or similar functionality, where we are permitted by applicable law to collect this information;"

case.title: Private messages can be read
case.localized_title: Les messages privés peuvent être lus
case.description: The Service is able to access, scan, review or read all user communications, including private messages, which may contain personal or sensitive data.

points.title: This service will warn users about website maintenance

case.title: You will be notified about website maintenance
case.localized_title: Ce service avertit les utilisateurs de la maintenance du site web
case.description: Users will be notified before their experience is impacted due to website maintenance.

points.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed

case.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
case.localized_title: Il n'est pas permis d'explorer le site, de le parcourir ou d'y accéder par des moyens automatisés.

points.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet the users' expectations or requirements

case.title: This service does not guarantee that it or the products obtained through it meet your expectations or requirements
case.localized_title: Ce service ne garantit pas que lui-même ou les produits obtenus par son intermédiaire répondent aux attentes ou aux exigences des utilisateurs
case.description: This service provider informs its users that the services, information, products, or other materials provided on its website may not meet the users' expectations or requirements.

points.title: The court of law governing the terms is in Netherlands

case.title: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
case.localized_title: La juridiction compétente est celle des Pays-Bas.
case.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction (specified in the title of each point by replacing the "X").

points.title: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis

case.title: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis
case.localized_title: Le service révise régulièrement sa politique en matière de protection de la vie privée
case.description: Users know the date the privacy policy was last updated and can thus infer the next time it will be reviewed. This gives users more certainty about how long they can trust the current policy to apply.

points.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

case.title: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez demander l'accès, la correction et/ou la suppression de vos données
case.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.

points.title: You can opt out of promotional communications

case.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez refuser les communications promotionnelles
case.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.

points.title: Your biometric data is collected

case.title: Your biometric data is collected
case.localized_title: Vos données biométriques sont collectées
case.description: This service can collect or use your biometric data. This includes but is not limited to facial recognition, fingerprints, and iris scans. Although this feature can sometimes be convenient to the user, providing this type of information to the service could open your personal data to being sold or stolen.

points.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world

case.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
case.localized_title: Vos données peuvent être traitées et stockées partout dans le monde
case.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.

points.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising
case.localized_title: Le service utilise vos données personnelles pour utiliser la publicité ciblée de tiers.
case.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.

points.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising

case.title: You can opt out of targeted advertising
case.localized_title: Vous pouvez refuser la publicité ciblée
case.description: The service employs your data to target ads to you, but you can opt-out of this interest-based advertising.

points.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation

case.title: This service gives your personal data to third parties involved in its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service transmet vos données personnelles à des tiers impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties essential to the service’s operation. This could be an external spam detection service for an internet forum.

points.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and device fingerprinting on users.

case.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
case.localized_title: Le service peut utiliser des pixels de suivi, des balises web, des empreintes de navigateur et des empreintes d'appareil pour les utilisateurs.
case.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

points.title: The service provides information about how they collect personal data

case.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des informations sur la manière dont il collecte les données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service details situations in which they collect personal information or means by which they do.

points.title: This service may keep personal data after a request for erasure for business interests or legal obligations

case.title: Some personal data may be kept for business interests or legal obligations
case.localized_title: Ce service peut conserver des données à caractère personnel après une demande d'effacement pour des raisons d'intérêt commercial ou d'obligations légales.
case.description: After the end of the data retention period and/or if you request the deletion of your data, they may still keep it for business interests (fraud detection, transactions...) or legal obligations (tax, legal reporting...)

points.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.

case.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
case.localized_title: Le service peut vendre ou transférer d'une autre manière vos données personnelles dans le cadre d'une procédure de faillite ou d'un autre type de transaction financière.
case.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.

points.title: The service uses your personal data for advertising

case.title: Your personal data is used for advertising
case.localized_title: Le service utilise vos données personnelles à des fins publicitaires
case.description: Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites.

points.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
case.localized_title: Les cookies de tiers sont utilisés pour les statistiques
case.description: For instance, Google Analytics, rather than self-hosted (first-party) statistics software.

points.title: Your profile is combined across various products

case.title: Your profile is combined across various products
case.localized_title: Votre profil est combiné à différents produits
case.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.

points.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for advertising

case.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
case.localized_title: Traçage via des cookies de tiers à des fins publicitaires
case.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

points.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

case.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
case.localized_title: Le blocage des cookies de première partie peut limiter votre capacité à utiliser le service
case.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

points.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

case.title: Information is provided about how your personal data is used
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des informations sur la manière dont il entend utiliser vos données à caractère personnel
case.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.

points.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect

case.title: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect
case.localized_title: Le service fournit des détails sur les types d'informations personnelles qu'il collecte
case.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.

points.title: The service uses social media cookies/pixels

case.title: You are being tracked via social media cookies/pixels
case.localized_title: Le service utilise des cookies/pixels de médias sociaux
case.description: These types of cookies/pixels send information to social media sites when you interact with the service.

points.title: They store data on you even if you did not interact with the service
points.analysis: Tracking on third-party websites containing Disney+ products, whether you have an account or not.

case.title: They store data on you even if you did not interact with the service
case.localized_title: Ils stockent des données sur vous même si vous n'avez pas interagi avec le service.
case.description: Some services store data on you even if you did not provide that data yourself. For example, users might provide access to their address book, after which a service might also store the phone numbers of that person's contacts.

points.title: The service collects many different types of personal data

case.title: Many different types of personal data are collected
case.localized_title: Le service recueille différents types de données à caractère personnel
case.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...

points.title: This service assumes no liability for any losses or damages resulting from any matter relating to the service
points.analysis: Unless they're caused by willful misconduct or they cause life or body damages; Disney+ shall not be liable for any losses or damages relating to the use of the service.

case.title: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs
case.localized_title: Ce service n'assume aucune responsabilité pour les pertes ou les dommages résultant de toute question relative au service.
case.description: The service assumes no liability for any damages the user incurs, including tangible (e.g. profits) and intangible losses (e.g. data), resulting from the use or inability to use the service or any other matter relating to the service.

points.title: When the service wants to change its terms, users are notified a week or more in advance.

case.title: When the service wants to change its terms, you are notified a week or more in advance.
case.localized_title: Lorsque le service souhaite modifier ses conditions, les utilisateurs en sont informés une semaine ou plus à l'avance.
case.description: Users will be notified a week before the Terms are somehow updated, which lets them a reasonable amount of time to carefully read the changes and perhaps stop using the services if they do not longer agree.

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data

case.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
case.localized_title: Ce service peut collecter, utiliser et partager des données de localisation
case.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).

points.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not involved in its operation

case.title: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation
case.localized_title: Ce service partage vos données personnelles avec des tiers qui ne sont pas impliqués dans son fonctionnement
case.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.

points.title: This service still tracks you even if you opted out from tracking

case.title: This service still tracks you even if you opted out from tracking
case.localized_title: Ce service continue de vous suivre même si vous avez choisi de ne pas le faire
case.description: Users can’t fully opt out of tracking technologies used for non essential purposes such as advertising, marketing or analytics. The user may be asked for consent for installing some tracking technologies on the device, and even if all are rejected the service will still track its visitors and ignore the choice.This case doesn’t apply to functional cookies that are necessary to provide the services.
